text: Mount Erebus is a volcano on Ross Island in Antarctica. It is the most southern active volcano in the world. Erebus is high. ==History== On November 28, 1979, an airplane, Air New Zealand Flight 901, crashed into Mount Erebus during a storm. All 257 people in the airplane died.Christchurch City Libraries, New Zealand Disasters, "Aircraft Accident: DC. 10 ZK-NZP Flight 901"; retrieved 2012-6-15. ==References== Category:Mountains of Antarctica Category:Volcanoes Category:VEI-6 volcanoes
title: Mount Erebus
